flawed_nl_solution:
When he gave 40 seashells to his friends, Ali had 180-40= <<180-40=410>>410 seashells.
When he gave another 30 seashells to his brothers, he had 410-30 = <<410-30=380>>380 seashells
He also sold half of the seashells, a total of 1/2*380 = <<1/2*380=190>>190 seashells
He was left with 380-190= <<380-190=190>>190 seashells

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 140, not 410. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
